img_above_text:
### Mind Core Location 8
The next Mind Core is also at the Rockrest Flat Shrine in Fright Cliff in Yellow Wind Ridge. This time, from the Shrine, go left and defeat the Stone Vanguard to get one.
img_below_text:
### Mind Core Location 9
The next Mind Core is at the Windrest Hamlet in Yellow Sand Formation in Yellow Wind Ridge. This can be accessed from the Valley of Despair Shrine in Sandgate Village.

img_summary: The image depicts a gameplay moment where the player character is engaged in combat with a large enemy called the "Stone Vanguard." This encounter is part of the process to obtain Mind Core Location 8, as described in the preceding text, which requires defeating the Stone Vanguard near the Rockrest Flat Shrine in Fright Cliff, Yellow Wind Ridge. The interface shows the player's health, abilities, and the enemy's health bar, emphasizing the action-oriented nature of the sequence.
